_header: To flee the sect of all misgovernance
Subjects: hope, lover’s; love, constancy in; lovers, faithful
_description: A Balade — three stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
TO fle the sett of alle mysgouernaunceI am truly wyth hole in sych
                    a palace…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…Wherfor I must obbey her womanhedeConstreynd of hert wyth
                    stedfast loue and drede
